articles.author: Jason Felix
articles.title: 'A torchbearer of our post-apartheid Parliament': Frene Ginwala hailed, mourned - News24
articles.description: South Africa has lost one of the foremost iconic leaders of its liberation struggle.
articles.content:
• The first Speaker of the National Assembly in a democratic South Africa, Frene Ginwala, has died.
  • Ginwala died on Thursday, at the age of 90, following a stroke two weeks ago.
